mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select room.*, item_title, item_status, item_seller, acc_id room_hostId, acc_nickname room_hostNickname, acc_profile room_hostProfile from chatroom room left join item on room_item = item_index left join account on item_seller = acc_index where item_status='ondeal') host join (select room_index room_index_g, repl_candidate, acc_id room_guestId, acc_nickname room_guestNickname, acc_profile room_guestProfile from chatroom room left join reply on room_reply = repl_index left join account on repl_candidate = acc_index) guest on host.room_index = guest.room_index_g) left join chat on room_index=chat_room where item_seller = #{loginMember__accIndex} or repl_candidate = #{loginMember__accIndex} order by chat_index

select * from (select room.*, item_title, item_status, item_seller, acc_id room_hostId, acc_nickname room_hostNickname, acc_profile room_hostProfile from chatroom room left join item on room_item = item_index left join account on item_seller = acc_index where item_status='ondeal') host join (select room_index room_index_g, repl_candidate, acc_id room_guestId, acc_nickname room_guestNickname, acc_profile room_guestProfile from chatroom room left join reply on room_reply = repl_index left join account on repl_candidate = acc_index) guest on host.room_index = guest.room_index_g where room_index = #{room_index}
